price: Ni bingahe mu biremwa bigenda ku isi bidashobora kwishakira amafunguro; Allah akaba ari We ubiha amafunguro ndetse namwe akayabaha? Kandi We ni Uwumva bihebuje, Umumenyi uhebuje.
arabic: وَكَأَيِّن مِّن دَآبَّةٖ لَّا تَحۡمِلُ رِزۡقَهَا ٱللَّهُ يَرۡزُقُهَا وَإِيَّاكُمۡۚ وَهُوَ ٱلسَّمِيعُ ٱلۡعَلِيمُ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: waka-ayyin min dābbatin lā taḥmilu riz'qahā al-lahu yarzuquhā wa-iyyākum wahuwa al-samīʿu al-ʿalīmu
